snippet: The official, Jeffrey Sterling, is charged with revealing a covert operation to disrupt Iran’s nuclear program.
abstract: Justice Dept moves ahead with prosecution against Jeffrey A Sterling, former Central Intelligence Agency official charged with revealing details of covert operation in Iran that were published in 2006 book State of War by New York Times reporter James Risen.
lead_paragraph: The official, Jeffrey Sterling, is charged with revealing a covert operation to disrupt Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.main: Trial Begins for Former C.I.A. Official Accused of Breaching National Security
headline.print_headline: Trial Begins for Former C.I.A. Official Accused of Breaching National Security

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
